sense.gloss: to throw away, to cast away, to dump, to discard
to abandon, to desert, to leave
cutting a person down (without a second thought), sacrificing, throwing to the wolves, treating as sword fodder
selection, making a choice, sifting, decision to adopt or reject
to cut off and throw away
to abandon, to disregard, to discard, to throw to the wolves
to discard (numbers after a certain decimal place), to drop, to omit, to ignore, to round down
addressing (someone) without using a suffix such as "-san" or "-chan" (considered impolite)
to abandon, to fail, to desert, to forsake

sdata.j: なぁ、↑金↑↓かね↓は↑無↑↓な↓いかもしれないけどまだプライドは↑捨↑↓す↓てちゃいないんだ。
sdata.e: Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓なら↑成功↑↓せいこう↓できるよ、がんばって。↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑見捨↑↓みす↓てない。
sdata.e: You can make it! Go for it. I'll stand by you.

sdata.j: ↑空腹↑↓くうふく↓で↑苦↑↓くる↓しむ↑地域↑↓ちいき↓があるというのに、↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓↑国内↑↓こくない↓では↑多↑↓おお↓くのレストランや↑家庭↑↓かてい↓でも↑多量↑↓たりょう↓の↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓が↑捨↑↓す↓てられているというのは、はずかしい↑事実↑↓じじつ↓です。
sdata.e: It is a shameful fact that, while there are lands where people suffer from hunger, within Japan there are many households and restaurants where much food is thrown away.

sdata.j: ↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓と↑言↑↓い↓うのはお↑天気↑↓てんき↓の↑日↑↓ひ↓に↑傘↑↓かさ↓を↑貸↑↓か↓したがるが、↑雨↑↓あめ↓の↑日↑↓ひ↓には、↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑見捨↑↓みす↓てようとするところだ。
sdata.e: Banks will try to lend you an umbrella on a sunny day, but they will turn their backs on a rainy day.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓かね↓をどぶに↑捨↑↓す↓てるようなものである。
↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓では、↑町↑↓まち↓を↑歩↑↓ある↓くと↑必↑↓かなら↓ず↑人↑↓ひと↓がゴミを↑捨↑↓す↓てるところを↑見↑↓み↓かけます。
sdata.e: These days you can't walk down the street without seeing people dropping litter.

sdata.j: ↑脚↑↓あし↓の↑壊↑↓こわ↓れている↑椅子↑↓いす↓は↑捨↑↓す↓てなさい。
sdata.e: Throw away the chairs whose legs are broken.

sdata.j: ↑希望↑↓きぼう↓を↑捨↑↓す↓ててはいけないよ。
sdata.e: You must not give up hope.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑相手↑↓あいて↓を↑見捨↑↓みす↓てないと↑約束↑↓やくそく↓した。
sdata.e: We made a pact that we wouldn't abandon one another.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑皆↑↓みな↓↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓がなぜあんな↑感↑↓かん↓じのいい↑男↑↓おとこ↓を↑捨↑↓す↓てたのか↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓に↑思↑↓おも↓った。
sdata.e: We all wondered why she had dumped such a nice man.

words.gloss: to throw away, to cast away, to dump, to discard
cutting a person down (without a second thought), sacrificing, throwing to the wolves, treating as sword fodder
